column2: "...I've been thinking about how you approached that fight, senpai."
"They come at you in swarms, but they mostly attack by rushing at you in a straight line. If you can dodge that, getting a Just Attack in should be easy, right?"

"That could be tricky if they've got Sparguns on their side...
I guess I'll have to learn how to deal with situations like that, too."

"I wish I could be like you, senpai...
I'm just not good enough yet."
